about:

ay clear in this server, this server is becoming one of my favorites: D 

My challenge is to improve on this server every day more and more hi alugno someday be of great as I would like to be :)! 

well this is my story and still need more

My team is Silent-Ninjas

a y en este server claro, este server se esta convirtiendo en uno de mis favoritos :D
